creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: huipil predominantly consists of vertical red and white stripes; multicolored geometric embroidery found at chest, shoulder, and back; geometric figures include diamonds, zigzags, and "x"s; neck opening is square in shape; constructed of three panels; sleeve openings consists of slits at sides
title: Huipil
